author: Ordinary Things
description:
Want to restore the planet’s ecosystems and see your impact in monthly videos? The first 100 people to join Planet Wild with my code ORDINARY10 will get the first month for free at: https://planetwild.com/r/ordinarythings/join If you want to get to know them better first, check out their project, stopping plastic before it gets into the ocean: https://planetwild.com/r/ordinarythings/m27
ANIMATION BY RICHARD PARRY

03:23 - The Fight Store
06:32 - The Prediction Market Shuffle
09:43 - Assassinations?
11:15 - The D**** Drop
15:08 - Bucket Shops

28:15 - Sportsbetting

title: SCAMification: The $90.1B Grifter Economy
